data.eml:eml: Revision, phylogeny and natural history of Cotithene Vo s s (Coleoptera: Curculionidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Franz, Nico M. (2008): Revision, phylogeny and natural history of Cotithene Vo s s (Coleoptera: Curculionidae). Zootaxa 1782: 1-33, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.182350
